name: Supreme Bacon
description: Discover a real good classic: melted cheese, bacon, onions and of course its flame-grilled meat. All accompanied by a BBQ sauce and a smoked sauce!

name: Chicken Farmy
description: A (very!) delicious crispy chicken burger, served with fresh tomatoes, salad and a creamy mayonnaise.

name: Sailor Fish
description: Craving fish? Let yourself be tempted by the Sailor Fish! Crispy breaded fish, a creamy sauce and a crunchy salad.

name: Maxi Wrap
description: Discover the Maxi Wrap! A slightly spicy sauce, crispy onions, two slices of cheese and an irresistible crispy breaded chicken. All wrapped up in a tortilla!

name: Triple trouble
description: Three flame-grilled beef, three slices of cheese, ketchup, mustard and two slices of pickles.

name: Classic Burger
description: Our favorite little one. Flame-grilled beef from France, ketchup, mustard and pickles. A classic.
